query:
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(saleDate, '%Y-%m') as mes,
  COUNT(*) as num_vendas,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantidade
FROM sales s
JOIN products p ON s.productId = p.id
WHERE p.code = '36543'
  AND s.saleDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY mes
ORDER BY mes

  DATE_FORMAT(saleDate, '%Y-%m') as mes,
  COUNT(*) as num_vendas,
  SUM(quantity) as total_quantidade
FROM sales s
JOIN products p ON s.productId = p.id
WHERE p.code = '36543'
  AND s.saleDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY mes
ORDER BY mes
